column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////First and foremost
column2: I wanted to thank you for being a regular customer but regret that you were very disappointed with your to-go order. The ramen chef apparently made the mistake of forgetting to add a seasoned egg
column4: but happens from time to time. We try our best to avoid mistakes such as this. But from what I can tell from your photo
column5: the noodle-toppings container does appear to have a double order of thin noodles. I asked my general manager Keith to take a look (he most likely was the employee who packed your order)
column6: and he said the level of the items in the container appear to match the order (with the exception of the egg).
